So Nausicaa is like my favourite movie/manga/fiction-type thing in the history of ever, and I needed a project, so hey! Let's build the thing from the thing!

I'm basically back to square one. I have no idea why the nose would be lifting up like that, being as heavy as it is. There aren't any lifting surfaces, so that ain't it. I tried thrust limiting, which helped a little, but it still popped up like an explosive salmon. I'm stumped. Y'all folks got any ideas to fix this?
